audio

Class MusicPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • audio.MusicPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MusicPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is used to make a playlist of songs that play in the background of the game. The class contains methods to manipulate and access music when required.
    Author:
    henrikwt
